Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Record Center at 9700 Page Boulevard, Overland, Missouri, as the "SSG Charles F. Prevedel Building".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Federal Records Center Extension Building in Overland, Missouri, as the Charles F. Prevedel Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Record Center at 9700 Page Boulevard, Overland, Missouri, as the "SSG Charles F. Prevedel Building".
